result.execSummary:
The defendant Alejandro J Medina was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alejandro J Medina is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Alejandro J Medina was found guilty of Possession of THC [Modifiers: as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Payment plan of $100.00/month commencing on 6-1-2016 and continuing to be due on the 1st of every month until paid in full. Payments made payable to the Ozaukee County Clerk of Courts.
Failure to pay will result in one day jail for every $25.00 outstanding.
Submit to DNA sample by 6-1-2016, at the Ozaukee County Jail

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
